short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amphy is a browser extension that helps you create and study notes with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amphy is an AI-powered Chrome extension that allows you to easily save and study notes from web pages.

- Highlight text on any web page
- Save highlights with a single click or keyboard shortcut
- View and manage your saved highlights in the extension popup
- Syncs across devices using Chrome storage
- Auto-summarize notes
- Generate a quiz with questions and hidden answers
- Ask any question and get an answer based on the saved notes
- Switch between local Gemini and Gemini API (key required)
